H3.text: who founded the kkk. David Duke

A4.text: The first Klan was established in Pulaski, Tennessee, on December 24, 1865, by six former officers of the Confederate Army: Frank McCord, Richard Reed, John Lester, John Kennedy, J. Calvin Jones, and James Crowe.

A5.text: Forrest joined the Ku Klux Klan in 1867, two years after the organization's founding, and was elected its first Grand Wizard.
